title: Qryptocard
author: Qryptocard
content: Hey Everyone,üåê Searching for a revolutionary way to manage your online transactions? Discover QryptoCard, your ticket to financial freedom!Experience financial freedom with QryptoCard! üí≥ Forget KYC constraints and simplify your online transactions. Load your cards with crypto, and to top it off, seamlessly add them to Apple Pay and Google Pay. Explore a new era of online payments with QryptoCard. üöÄ‚ú®üöÄ **Load with Crypto up to 1000$:** Embark on a crypto journey with the ability to load your cards with cryptocurrency. Transform your online payment experience with simplicity and speed.üåü **Maximum Security:** Security is our top priority. QryptoCard provides a highly secure platform for your transactions, allowing you to navigate the digital world with confidence.üîê **Total Privacy:** Your data remains private. QryptoCard is committed to ensuring total privacy, offering you absolute peace of mind.üëâ **Join the Financial Revolution:** Explore a new era of online payments with QryptoCard. Break free from constraints and embrace simplicity and security.üì≤ **Sign up now at https://qryptocard.com and discover ease in every transaction.****#QryptoCard #FinancialFreedom #CryptoRevolution**https://t.me/qryptocard_officiel

comments.author: SFR10
comments.body: Quote from: Qryptocard on December 09, 2023, 11:13:29 PMüöÄ **Load with Crypto up to 1000$:**It appears that there's a way to extend that number by $9000 for certain types of users: Screenshot- On the same page, you're asking your users to accept the "Terms & Conditions" without having one [it goes back to the homepage]!- On your homepage, you're claiming "Thousands of people" are using your card, but I'm pretty sure that's not true for a service that's one month old [bad first impression]!BTW, this thread belongs to the Service Announcements board [move topic button is in the bottom left corner of the page].

comments.author: dkbit98
comments.body: Quote from: SFR10 on December 10, 2023, 02:44:54 PM On the same page, you're asking your users to accept the "Terms & Conditions" without having oneNow ain't that funny, but who needs Terms & Conditions anyway I tried to create one card for testing and first I saw that everything on website is written on French language, so I had to switch to eniglish.Than when I tried to create card I received big red warning sign that something is missing... so it's impossible to enter details and create card.I tried in different browsers, so this was not error or my side for sure.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: At the bottom of your website, I read thisQuoteThe Qryptocard is a prepaid Visa card issued by Paytend Europe UAB. No. LB000480. Qryptocard LTD is an authorised representative of Paytend Europe UAB (No. LB000480).Paytend (paytend.com) happens to be another service that offers virtual and physical cards. What proves that you have a partnership with them?Why wouldn't anyone just sign up for paytend instead? What advantage do you have over them that would make customers choose to get the cards through you.

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin_Arena on December 11, 2023, 10:51:17 PMAt the bottom of your website, I read thisQuoteThe Qryptocard is a prepaid Visa card issued by Paytend Europe UAB. No. LB000480. Qryptocard LTD is an authorised representative of Paytend Europe UAB (No. LB000480).Paytend (paytend.com) happens to be another service that offers virtual and physical cards. What proves that you have a partnership with them?Why wouldn't anyone just sign up for paytend instead? What advantage do you have over them that would make customers choose to get the cards through you.I did not find anything related to the relationship between Paytend Europe UAB and this service, in addition to the fact that the design of the site, the date of creation, many bugs and how to promote it raise a lot of doubts and therefore this service is a scam or bad and it is best to avoid it at best.

comments.author: SFR10
comments.body: Quote from: dkbit98 on December 11, 2023, 07:41:19 PMNow ain't that funny, but who needs Terms & Conditions anyway Me... Me  On a serious note, it's one of the easiest ways of spotting dodgy brands, but most users tend to ignore it until it's too late [unfortunately].Quote from: dkbit98 on December 11, 2023, 07:41:19 PMI tried to create one card for testing and first I saw that everything on website is written on French language, so I had to switch to eniglish.Than when I tried to create card I received big red warning sign that something is missing... so it's impossible to enter details and create card.I tried in different browsers, so this was not error or my side for sure.https://www.talkimg.com/images/2023/12/11/E6iIW.jpegIt appears that they've fixed that issue [payments go through FCF Pay gateway and last time I checked, they were offering similar services as well], but I still wouldn't try using them without seeing how they'd address our concerns!
